features: Laundry detergent pacs (120-count); enough for 120 medium loads
Lavender scent; gives clothes the fresh scent of lavender while delivering a great clean
Dissolves in any water temperature, even cold
Good for both standard and high efficiency (HE) washing machines
Use 1 pac for 1 medium load; pre-measured for extra convenience
Running low? Restock by asking, "Alexa, order Amazon Basics laundry detergent pacs" through your Alexa device.
body.description: Amazon Basics Lavender laundry pacs are premeasured to bring convenience to your laundry routine. Amazon Basics laundry pacs dissolve in any water temperature and are safe for both regular and high efficiency (HE) washing machines. These pacs are safe for septic systems and, as always, contain no phosphates. Look for Fresh Scent, Free and Clear, and Lavender Amazon Basics laundry detergent pacs. This package includes one tub of 120 Lavender laundry detergent pacs, enough for 120 medium loads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics Lavender Laundry Detergent Pacs One Strong Pac Each premeasured dose gives you an outstanding clean in one tiny little pac. Enjoy the Lavender Scent Gives your clothes a bright, fresh scent while delivering a great clean. How to Use Add pac(s) to empty drum, then add laundry and wash as usual. Whitens, Brightens Powerful stain fighters get your whites white and your colors bright wash after wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is just as great as the other overpriced detergents on the market
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Amazon Basics laundry detergent and I have been quite pleased with its performance.Firstly, the price point of this detergent is very affordable compared to other brands on the market. It is a great option for those who are looking to save some money without compromising on quality.In terms of effectiveness, I found that the Amazon Basics detergent does a great job at cleaning my clothes. It effectively removes stains and leaves my laundry smelling fresh and clean. I have used it on a variety of fabrics and colors, and it has not caused any fading or damage.Another aspect that I appreciate about this detergent is its packaging. The bottle is sturdy and easy to handle, with a convenient measuring cap that allows for precise pouring.Overall, I highly recommend the Amazon Basics laundry detergent. It offers great cleaning power, a pleasant scent, and an affordable price. It is a reliable option for everyday laundry needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product and Price
reviews.reviewText: Great mild scent, really cleans, great price for -120 pods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells good, good value for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY HAPPY WITH THE VALUE AND IT WORKS REALLY WELL
reviews.reviewText: Amazon Basics Laundry Detergent Pacs have exceeded my expectations. The hypoallergenic, free, and clear formula is gentle on my skin, and the convenience of the pacs makes laundry a breeze. The pack of 120 ensures I'm well-stocked, and the effectiveness in removing stains and odors is impressive. A reliable and cost-effective choice for anyone looking for a hassle-free laundry solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: About a year ago I had to replace my washer. I loved my 28 year old Amana. I don’t like the new washer I have and one reason is because the cloths don’t seem clean and there were always White detergent marks in the clothes. We tried everything to fix this. I decided to try PODS. These PODS work great and I will continue to buy them. Never thought changing from liquid to PODS would fix the issue! THANK U AMAZON!I highly recommend these PODS. They were a good value too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon basics laundry pods
reviews.reviewText: It does dissolve in cold water.I have a 3.0 cu washer, so for me one pod is enough. For regular house hold washers on large setting, you will need two pods.I have read some of the reviews, a few mentioned that the pods doesn't dissolve in cold water. So what I do is I put a pod in let the washer fill with water a few inches and "as my hubby says" I play with the pod, I swish it around in the water until it is completely dissolve. Then I put my laundry in. By doing this I have no problem with the pods.I got the lavender! It's not over powering with the smell, but enough for me to smell it!! And so far it cleans great!!Would I recommend? Yes!!!Now for those who have the twin tub portable washers. One pod would be way too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: These are okay. If you don’t have anything stinky going in like sweaty gym clothes or soiled doggy stuff or whatever, it’s alright, and it’s less expensive than the name brand pods. But I have two dogs and three kids and a husband who gets kinda stanky :) at the gym, and I don’t find that the odor fighting ability with these is all that great even with vinegar and scent boosters…it all comes out the same—less stinky, but it still doesn’t smell totally fresh. I can still smell dog in the dog blankets and sweat in my husband’s tank tops. I would still pay the extra money on Tide for smelly stuff, but if all you’re washing is your day-to-day clothes and kitchen towels and such, this works just fine. There’s no magical stain fighting to it, so I’d recommend using hydrogen peroxide and dawn dish soap for stains before washing. If you want a one and done pod, I don’t think this will be it. If you don’t have a particularly dirty life with lots of sweat or kid messes or dog messes, this might be your best money-saving option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This detergent is great and super concentrated. It only takes one pod for a pretty big load of laundry so this pack lasts me forever. Super affordable for how long it lasts! The lavender scented one is my favorite. It smells lovely but isn't overpowering. Does clean really well, takes care of all my toddlers messes on their clothes!
